titles: To the right vvorshipfull, the alderman, and common counsell-men of the vvard of Farrington within, at their VVard-Moot, 22. Decemb. 1645 a representation of the humble and earnest desires of the inhabitants of the said ward.
publisher: Printed for Henry Shepheard at the Bible in Tower-Street, and William Ley at Pauls-Chaine neer Doctors Commons,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
